title: As a User I want the Highmark Insurance batch to send an add for minor league players who have their MJ flag unset on opening day
custom_steps:
On opening day any players who were Mn Outrighted over the course of the prior season up until the start date of the new season will have their MJ flag shut off by the mj insurance batch.  When this happens the Highmark batch should detect the change and send an 'add' insurance record for the player.

In addition to the add being sent, it should set the players MN insurance flag.
